thread.title: A 3rd F1 world title would secure legacy for Lewis Hamilton
thread.title_full: A 3rd F1 world title would secure legacy for Lewis Hamilton - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Jim Vertuno, Ap Sports Writer
title: A 3rd F1 world title would secure legacy for Lewis Hamilton
text: Photo: Eric Gay, AP Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton, of Britain, responds to a question during a news conference at the Formula One U.S. Grand Prix auto race at the Circuit of the Americas, Thursday, Oct. 22, 2015, in Austin, Texas. Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton, of Britain, responds to a question... AUSTIN, Texas (AP) — Thirty miles away from the Circuit of the Americas, with its iconic red, white and blue racing stripes and grandstands that will be filled with more than 100,000 fans for the United States Grand Prix, Lewis Hamilton was being a kid again. Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton, of Britain, responds to a question during a news conference at the Formula One U.S. Grand Prix auto race at the Circuit of the Americas, Thursday, Oct. 22, 2015, in Austin, Texas. Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton, of Britain, responds to a question... AUSTIN, Texas (AP) — Thirty miles away from the Circuit of the Americas, with its iconic red, white and blue racing stripes and grandstands that will be filled with more than 100,000 fans for the United States Grand Prix, Lewis Hamilton was being a kid again.
